Uses of Class
it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers.ObservableObject

Packages that use ObservableObject 
Package Description
it.polimi.ingsw.controller  
it.polimi.ingsw.core  
it.polimi.ingsw.network  
it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers  

  • Uses of ObservableObject in it.polimi.ingsw.controller

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.controller with parameters of type ObservableObject 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void ServerController.updateBuild​(ObservableObject observed, NetGaming buildMessage)
    This method is called when a client wants to perform a certain build, if the player cannot perform a build because the indicated one is forbidden or because it isn't its turn or it is the wrong phase, this method is going to call the error handling method of the RemoteView and stops.
    void ServerController.updateColors​(ObservableObject observed, NetColorPreparation playerColors)
    This method receives a request from a client through its RemoteView and analyze if it's the player's turn and if it is the correct phase (the color phase), if this conditions are all true then the method calls the SetupManager, otherwise it calls the error handling method of the RemoteView.
    void ServerController.updateGods​(ObservableObject observed, NetDivinityChoice playerGods)
    This method receives a request from a client through its RemoteView and analyze if it's the player's turn and if it is the correct phase (the gods phase), if this conditions are all true then the method calls the SetupManager, otherwise it calls the error handling method of the RemoteView.
    void ServerController.updateMove​(ObservableObject observed, NetGaming moveMessage)
    This function is called when a player can move and want to perform a certain move, if it can't move this method is going to call the error handling method of the RemoteView and stops.
    void ServerController.updatePositions​(ObservableObject observed, NetGameSetup netObject)
    This method receives a request from a client through its RemoteView and analyze if it's the player's turn and if it is the correct phase (the positioning workers on game map phase), if this conditions are all true then the method calls the SetupManager, otherwise it calls the error handling method of the RemoteView.
    void ServerController.updateQuit​(ObservableObject observed, java.lang.String playerName)
    This method is called when a player wants to quit the game, it make it quit and changes the model, if the player isn't inside the game this method is going to call the error handling method of the RemoteView and stops.

  • Uses of ObservableObject in it.polimi.ingsw.core

    Subclasses of ObservableObject in it.polimi.ingsw.core 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Game
    This class is the main class for the model in the Distributed MVC pattern, this class is one of the few accessible classes of the core (the model) package, it expose some methods accessible from the outside classes which can be used to change the values of the game.

  • Uses of ObservableObject in it.polimi.ingsw.network

    Subclasses of ObservableObject in it.polimi.ingsw.network 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  RemoteView
    This class is the remote view class of the Distributed MVC pattern, it receives input from client's view and forward these commands to the controller with light controls.
    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.network with parameters of type ObservableObject 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void RemoteView.updateBuild​(ObservableObject observed, Map netMap)
    This method sends a message to the client with the information about the updated map.
    void RemoteView.updateGods​(ObservableObject observed, java.lang.String godsInfo)
    This function says to the player the player who starts to position its workers on the game board
    void RemoteView.updateGods​(ObservableObject observed, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​GodCard> godsInfo)
    This function says to the player all gods selected till now by the players
    void RemoteView.updateGods​(ObservableObject observed, java.util.List<GodCard> godsInfo)
    This function says to all players the gods chosen by the challenger for this game
    void RemoteView.updateMove​(ObservableObject observed, Map netMap)
    This method sends a message to the client with the information about the updated map.
    void RemoteView.updateQuit​(ObservableObject observed, java.lang.String playerName)
    Sends the information to the client about a player that has disconnected.

  • Uses of ObservableObject in it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers

    Subclasses of ObservableObject in it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ObservableGame
    This class is the class that represent the Observer pattern used in Distributed MVC pattern used to create Santorini's video game, it is a class that represent a game that can be observer from ObserverRemoteView to gain information about the change of the game state using Observer pattern.
    class  ObservableRemoteView
    This class represent the Observer for remote views inside the Distributed MVC pattern used to design Santorini video game, this class represent a remote view which communicate with a ObserverController to update the server about the choices done by the player during a match.
    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers with parameters of type ObservableObject 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void ObserverController.updateBuild​(ObservableObject observed, NetGaming netMap)
    Updates the observer when the observer calls this method because someone wants to build.
    void ObserverRemoteView.updateBuild​(ObservableObject observed, Map netMap)
    This method is called when game state changed because someone has built on the map and the player will be notified.
    void ObserverController.updateColors​(ObservableObject observed, NetColorPreparation playerColors)
    Updates the observer when the observer calls this method because a player wants to choose a color.
    void ObserverController.updateGods​(ObservableObject observed, NetDivinityChoice playerGods)
    Updates the observer when the observer calls this method wants to perform an action during the gods phase.
    void ObserverRemoteView.updateGods​(ObservableObject observed, java.lang.String godsInfo)
    This method is called when game state changed because the challenger chose the starter and the player must be informed.
    void ObserverRemoteView.updateGods​(ObservableObject observed, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​GodCard> godsInfo)
    This method is called when game state changed because a player has chosen a god, the player will be informed about current gods chosen.
    void ObserverRemoteView.updateGods​(ObservableObject observed, java.util.List<GodCard> godsInfo)
    This method is called when game state changed and gods have been chosen by the challenger.
    void ObserverController.updateMove​(ObservableObject observed, NetGaming netMap)
    Updates the observer when the observer calls this method because someone wants to move.
    void ObserverRemoteView.updateMove​(ObservableObject observed, Map netMap)
    This method is called when game state changed because someone moved a worker and the player will be notified.
    void ObserverController.updatePositions​(ObservableObject observed, NetGameSetup netObject)
    Updates the observer when the observer calls this method because a player wants to position its worker on the game table.
    void ObserverObject.updateQuit​(ObservableObject observed, java.lang.String playerName)
    Updated the observer after it has been notifies by the observer of the quit of a player.
